#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    vector <long long int> container;
    int tests, n, k;
    cin >> tests;
    long long int h[10001][tests];
    for(int i = 0; i<tests; i++)
    {
        h[0][i] = 1;
        h[1][i] = 1;
        cin >> n >> k;
        for(int j = 2; j<=n; j++)
        {
            if(j-k-1>=0)
            {
                h[j][i] = h[j-1][i] + h[j-1][i] - h[j-k-1][i] + 1000000007;
            }
            else
            {
                h[j][i] = h[j-1][i] + h[j-1][i] + 1000000007;
            }
            h[j][i] %=1000000007;
        }
        container.push_back(h[n][i]);
    }
    for(int i = 0; i<tests; i++)
    {
        cout << container[i] << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
